description: --- home: true heroImage: /nasa_transonic_tunnel.jpg actionText: Get Started → actionLink: /GettingStarted.md features: - title: Simplicity First   details: Minimal setup with markdown-centered project structure helps you focus on writing. - title: Vue-Powered   details: Enjoy the dev experience of Vue + webpack, use Vue components in markdown, and develop custom themes with Vue. - title: Performant   details: VuePress generates pre-rendered static HTML for each page, and runs as an SPA once a page is loaded. footer: MIT Licensed | Copyright © 2018-present Evan You ---
